name: Response To Audit Processing Failures
description: The information system alerts appropriate organizational officials in the event of an audit processing failure and takes the following additional actions: [Assignment: organization-defined actions to be taken (e.g., shut down information system, overwrite oldest audit records, stop generating audit records)].
supplemental_guidance: Audit processing failures include, for example, software/hardware errors, failures in the audit capturing mechanisms, and audit storage capacity being reached or exceeded. Related security control: AU-04.

rev5.name: Response to Audit Logging Process Failures
rev5.changes_from_rev4: Title changed from â€˜Response to Audit Processing Failures' Adds parameter text to alert within a specific time period Discussion added regarding audit logging process failure related to storage
